revision.comment: it's better to know what the property does first before knowing how to use it
revision.text:
Properties introduced by {{Class|BasicArmorBonus}}.
<onlyinclude>* '''{{LE|Armor.SavePercent}}''' ''percentage'' :The percentage of dealt damage that the armor absorbs. :Percentage is specified as a floating point value between 0.0 and 100.0 which is converted internally to a floating point value between 0.0 and 1.0 * '''{{LE|Armor.MaxSaveAmount}}''' ''amount'' :Sets the maximum amount of armor you can reach by picking up this item. * '''{{LE|Armor.SaveAmount}}''' ''amount'' :The amount of armor that this item gives. * '''{{LE|Armor.MaxBonus}}''' ''amount'' :The amount of armor you obtain additionally to your save amount value. * '''{{LE|Armor.MaxBonusMax}}''' ''amount'' :The maximum additional save amount you can obtain with the armor.</onlyinclude> [[Category:Editing references]]
